                    <div class="widgetBody">
                        
        <section class="image-foreground white-background" style="background-image: url(&quot;/ui/images/img-personalized-bg.jpg&quot;);"><div class="two-column-header-module"><div class="container"><div class="row"><div class="col-md-6"><h2>Personalized<br />for You</h2></div><div class="col-md-6"><p>From an individualized treatment plan that recognizes who you are, to specialized therapies based on the genetic profile of your specific cancer  everything we do is centered around your unique needs.</p></div></div></div></div><div class="personalized-care-module"><div class="container"><div class="row"><div class="col-md-offset-6 col-md-6"><div class="personalized-care-wrapper"><div class="row"><div class="col-sm-6"><div class="personalized-care-box"><a href="javascript:void(0)" data-target="your-care-team"><span>Your Care Team</span></a></div></div><div class="col-sm-6"><div class="personalized-care-box"><a href="javascript:void(0)" data-target="specialized-centers"><span>Specialized Centers</span></a></div></div><div class="col-sm-6"><div class="personalized-care-box"><a href="javascript:void(0)" data-target="patient-and-family-support-services"><span>Patient &amp; Family Support Services</span></a></div></div><div class="col-sm-6"><div class="personalized-care-box"><a href="javascript:void(0)" data-target="counseling"><span>Counseling</span></a></div></div><div class="col-sm-6"><div class="personalized-care-box"><a href="javascript:void(0)" data-target="nutrition-services"><span>Nutrition Services</span></a></div></div><div class="col-sm-6"><div class="personalized-care-box"><a href="javascript:void(0)" data-target="integrative-therapies"><span>Integrative Therapies</span></a></div></div></div></div></div></div></div><div class="personalized-care-slider"><div class="personalized-care-overlay"></div><div class="your-care-team slider-content" style="opacity: 0; right: -125%;"><a href="javascript:void(0)" class="close-slider"><i class="custom-icon-close" aria-hidden="true"></i></a><h2>Your Care Team</h2><p>Patients of every age need care tailored to their needs. Just as caring for children requires a distinct set of approaches and techniques, the same is true for adults across the age span. For children, for young adults, for older adults  at Dana-Farber, our experts have the clinical expertise, experience, and compassion to treat you, your child, or your loved one with the specialized approach they need. </p><ul><li><a href="/for-patients-and-families/care-and-treatment/nursing-and-patient-care/">Nursing and Patient Care</a></li><li><a href="/for-patients-and-families/care-and-treatment/your-care-team/">Your Care Team</a></li></ul></div><div class="specialized-centers slider-content" style="opacity: 0; right: -125%;"><a href="javascript:void(0)" class="close-slider"><i class="custom-icon-close" aria-hidden="true"></i></a><h2>Specialized Centers</h2><p>We care for adults and children with cancer in our specialized treatment centers, focused on specific cancer types. Our teams of specialists work closely together to offer patients the latest therapies and clinical services, including access to innovative clinical trials.</p><ul><li><a href="/for-patients-and-families/care-and-treatment/treatment-centers/">Treatment Centers and Clinical Services</a></li></ul></div><div class="patient-and-family-support-services slider-content" style="opacity: 0; right: -125%;"><a href="javascript:void(0)" class="close-slider"><i class="custom-icon-close" aria-hidden="true"></i></a><h2>Patient &amp; Family Support Services</h2><p>We understand that cancer affects patients and their families in many ways. We offer a wide range of services, from financial planning to creative arts to spiritual care and more, to support our patients through their cancer experiences.</p><ul><li><a href="/for-patients-and-families/care-and-treatment/support-services-and-amenities/">Support Services for Patients and Families</a></li></ul></div><div class="counseling slider-content" style="opacity: 0; right: -125%;"><a href="javascript:void(0)" class="close-slider"><i class="custom-icon-close" aria-hidden="true"></i></a><h2>Counseling</h2><p>Patients and their loved ones often face many new concerns and anxieties following a cancer diagnosis. Dana-Farbers team of social workers, psychologists, psychiatrists, and other staff work with patients, families, and other members of the health care team to provide integrated care and support for each patients unique needs.</p><ul><li><a href="/for-patients-and-families/care-and-treatment/support-services-and-amenities/adult-social-work-program/ ">Social Work</a></li><li><a href="/for-patients-and-families/care-and-treatment/support-services-and-amenities/support-groups-and-seminars/">Support Groups</a></li><li><a href="/adult-psychosocial-oncology/">Adult Psychosocial Oncology</a></li><li><a href="/pediatric-psychosocial-oncology-program/">Pediatric Psychosocial Oncology</a></li><li><a href="/for-patients-and-families/care-and-treatment/support-services-and-amenities/spiritual-care">Spiritual Care</a></li></ul></div><div class="nutrition-services slider-content" style="opacity: 0; right: -125%;"><a href="javascript:void(0)" class="close-slider"><i class="custom-icon-close" aria-hidden="true"></i></a><h2>Nutrition Services</h2><p>Nutrition experts at Dana-Farber will help you follow a healthy diet during and after your cancer treatment. We have special training in oncology and nutrition, and base our advice on scientifically sound nutrition research.</p><ul><li><a href="/for-patients-and-families/care-and-treatment/support-services-and-amenities/nutrition-services/">Nutrition Services</a></li></ul></div><div class="integrative-therapies slider-content" style="opacity: 0; right: -125%;"><a href="javascript:void(0)" class="close-slider"><i class="custom-icon-close" aria-hidden="true"></i></a><h2>Integrative Therapies</h2><p>The Leonard P. Zakim Center for Integrative Therapies and Healthy Living at Dana-Farber is dedicated to enhancing the quality of life for cancer patients and their families by incorporating complementary therapies   including acupuncture, massage, Reiki, meditation, creative arts, and movement classes  into traditional cancer care.</p><ul><li><a href="/for-patients-and-families/care-and-treatment/support-services-and-amenities/zakim-center-for-integrative-therapies/ ">Zakim Center Programs</a></li><li><a href="/for-patients-and-families/care-and-treatment/support-services-and-amenities/expressive-arts-therapy/">Expressive Arts Therapy</a></li></ul></div></div></div></section>
            
                    </div>
                </div>
            
	</div>
